latestAction.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 228 (Roll No. 401).
On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 221 (Roll No. 72).

Mr. Sessions raised a point of order against the Kucinich amendment (A001). Mr. Sessions stated that the amendment offered by Mr. Kucinich violated the germaness rule and as such, should be ruled out of order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

Mr. Schaefer, Dan raised a point of order against the Kucinich amendment (A002). Mr. Schaefer stated that the content of the amendment was non-germane to the bill and was, therefore, in violation of the rule of the House. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
